column5: We fish lotw and the crayfish are everywhere. Have you heard of people fishing with them for eyes?
I believe it is illegal to use crawfish as bait in the Canadian portion of LOTW because of the fear of introduction of the Rusty Craw - an invasive species.
Yeah but you catch them there
There also delish to snack on as well. Jerk knows all about this
Not at LOTW but I caught pike the other day, and filleted them. They were full of crayfish.
